official_title: To rename the Department of Commerce as the Department of Manufacturing and Commerce, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Manufacturing and Commerce Act of 1992

summary.text: Department of Manufacturing and Commerce Act of 1992 - Renames the Department of Commerce as the Department of Manufacturing and Commerce. Directs the President to establish a Manufacturing Advisory Commission to examine Federal agencies, programs, and offices responsible for manufacturing-related research and development, technology transfer, education, and trade in order to prepare a report for the Congress on the feasibility of consolidating such agencies, programs, and offices into a single Office of Manufacturing within the Department.

titles.title: Department of Manufacturing and Commerce Act of 1992
To rename the Department of Commerce as the Department of Manufacturing and Commerce, and for other purposes.
